name: Coconut Boy Goes to a Party
name_original: Coconut Boy Goes to a Party
description:
Summary:

Coconut Boy, a coconut who is also a boy, has been invited to a party across the beach! Take control of the coconutty boy as he avoids the shifting sea waters and angry crabs! Try to collect all 80 flowers for the party!

This game was made in Unity and drawn in Aseprite, as a project for Azusa Pacific University's Game Design curriculum. 

Controls:

A = Left

D = Right

Space = Jump

Disclaimer: 

There is a known bug that prevents coins spawning when loading in a  new level, seems to reset on death. Currently working on a solution, will update the game when I have it.
